items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Common metallic ore found in asteroid belts. Used in basic ship repairs and construction.

items.name: Platinum Ore
items.description: Rare precious metal with high market value and advanced manufacturing applications.

items.name: Helium-3
items.description: Fusion reactor fuel. Extracted from gas giants and solar winds. Essential for long-range travel.

items.name: Emergency Repair Kit
items.description: Portable repair tools and materials for quick hull breaches and system fixes.

items.name: Ancient Data Core
items.description: Pre-Surge data storage containing valuable information. Highly sought after by researchers.

items.name: Advanced Shield Capacitor
items.description: High-efficiency energy storage for shield systems. Increases shield recharge rate.

pools.name: Asteroid Mining Loot
pools.description: Common ores and materials found when mining asteroids

pools.name: Derelict Ship Salvage
pools.description: Items recovered from abandoned ships and stations

pools.name: Mining Success Narratives
pools.description: Various success messages for mining operations

entries.title: Rich Vein Discovered
entries.message: Your scanners light up as you breach a particularly rich mineral deposit. This is going to be a good haul.

entries.title: Standard Operation
entries.message: The mining lasers cut through the asteroid surface smoothly. Nothing fancy, but steady work pays off.

entries.title: Unexpected Find
entries.message: Wait... these readings can't be right. There's something else embedded in this rock...

entries.title: Jackpot Strike
entries.message: ALERT: High-value mineral concentration detected! Your cargo hold is going to love this.

pools.name: Mining Failure Narratives
pools.description: Various failure messages for mining operations

entries.title: Equipment Malfunction
entries.message: The mining laser sputters and dies. You'll need to reset the system before trying again.

entries.title: Unstable Asteroid
entries.message: Cracks spiderweb across the asteroid's surface. You pull back before the whole thing fragments.

entries.title: Pirate Interruption
entries.message: Your proximity alarms blare. Three hostile contacts incoming. Looks like someone doesn't want you mining here.

pools.name: Scan Discovery Narratives
pools.description: Revealing what you've discovered during scans

entries.title: Type-I Iron Cluster
entries.message: Scan complete. Standard iron-rich asteroid cluster. Common, but valuable.

entries.title: Type-II Platinum Vein
entries.message: Your sensors pick up precious metal signatures. A platinum deposit—rare and extremely valuable.

entries.title: Type-III Volatile Ice
entries.message: WARNING: Volatile compounds detected. This asteroid contains explosive ice formations. Proceed with extreme caution.

entries.title: Type-IV Rare Earth
entries.message: Interesting... rare earth elements in high concentration. These are used in advanced ship components.

entries.title: Type-V Ancient Core
entries.message: This is impossible. These mineral formations predate the Surge by centuries. What were they mining for?

entries.title: Active Station Hails
entries.message: The station's automated systems acknowledge your approach. Docking clearance granted.

entries.title: Derelict Silence
entries.message: No response to your hails. The station's lights are dark. Looks like it's been abandoned for some time.

entries.title: Distress Signal
entries.message: Emergency beacon active. Life support failing. Someone on that station needs help—fast.
entries.systemMessage: Distress signal detected - rescue mission available

entries.title: Hostile Lockdown
entries.message: WARNING: Weapons lock detected! The station's defense turrets are tracking your ship.
